Class Pent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClosedShape
      • Pent

  • public class Pent
extends ClosedShape
    Pentagon is a shape that can be drawn to the screen, either filled with colour or opaque. Its position is determined by the upper left corner of the pentagon's bounding rectangle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pent(int insertionTime, int x, int y, int vx, int vy, int side, javafx.scene.paint.Color colour, boolean isFilled, boolean isPulsing)
      Creates Pentagon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pent

        public Pent(int insertionTime,
            int x,
            int y,
            int vx,
            int vy,
            int side,
            javafx.scene.paint.Color colour,
            boolean isFilled,
            boolean isPulsing)
        Creates Pentagon.
        Parameters:
        x - The display component's x position.
        y - The display component's y position.
        vx - The display component's x velocity.
        vy - The display component's y velocity.
        width - The width of the oval (in pixels).
        height - The height of the oval (in pixels).
        colour - The line colour or fill colour.
        insertionTime - The time which you get displayed on the screen
        isFilled - True if the oval is filled with colour, false if opaque.
        isPulsing - True if the shape is pulsing, false otherwise

        Does not return anything.
